trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_SEQ_00<tab>Dmitar has exciting news to share from the southern front.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>A Resistance rank of <var 20 E802 /var> is required to proceed with this quest.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_000<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! We received word from the field─the Empire's forces have fallen back!
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_001<tab>In fact, our troops have pushed forward far enough as to claim an enemy encampment near the southern entrenchment.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_002<tab>My commanding officer has instructed me to give you a brief tour of the site at your earliest convenience. I will await you there.

TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_020<tab>Welcome to Olana's Stand. If you wish to travel between here and Utya's Aegis, feel free to use that aetheryte shard over there. I would suggest attuning to it before you leave.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_021<tab>And one last thing: while we've made great strides in our fight against the Empire, there's still much to be done before we can retake Castrum Lacus Litore.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_DMITAR_000_022<tab>I expect the enemy will only grow more determined as we advance forward, but we must press on. For Bozja!
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The Resistance front line advances, allowing you to participate in new skirmishes and critical engagements.
TEXT_LUCKSA105_03945_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The next quest can be accepted by speaking with Mikoto after reaching Resistance rank <var 20 E802 /var> or higher.
